vendor_name: Ramada Resort by Wyndham Shoal Bay
title: Beachside Shoal Bay Suites along NSW North Coast with Lagoon Pool & Dining Credit
description:
Follow the sun-kissed Central Coast to Shoal Bay, and enjoy a relaxing beachside paradise perched on the glorious shores in Port Stephens, an hour from Newcastle. Home to a sun-lit lagoon pool with a kids' wading area and indoor lap pool, the palm-fringed Ramada Resort by Wyndham Shoal Bay is ideal for groups and families travelling with children, and offers suites for two to six guests. 

Work up a sweat at the indoor gym, dine at one of onsite eateries or unwind at Sirène Spa - this tranquil retreat has something for everyone.

Explore the surrounding coastal trails on foot or take to two wheels and feel the sea breeze from a bicycle. Plunge into the rolling waves on a stand-up paddle board, test out your rowing skills in the comfort of a kayak, explore nearby Port Stephens or take the drive south to Newcastle, where top restaurants, boutiques, galleries and more gorgeous beaches await.
location_description: Ramada Resort by Wyndham Shoal Bay
offer_address: 35-45 Shoal Bay Road, Shoal Bay, New South Wales 2315, Australia
